verses.verse: We Should Fear <S%G5399><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Lest Perhaps <S%G3379><s%> Being Left <S%G2641><s%> A Promise <S%G1860><s%> To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2663><s%> His Rest, <S%G846><s%> Might Seem <S%G1380><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> To Come Short. <S%G5302><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Indeed <S%G1063><s%> We Have Had <S%G2070><s%> Glad Tidings Announced To Us <S%G2097><s%> Even As <S%G2509><s%> Also They; <S%G2548><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Did Profit <S%G5623><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Report <S%G189><s%> Them, <S%G1565><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having Been Mixed With <S%G4786><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> In Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Heard. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G1525><s%> For We Enter <S%G1063><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest, <S%G2663><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Believed; <S%G4100><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> He Has Said, <S%G2046><s%> So <S%G5613><s%> I Swore <S%G3660><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3709><s%> My Wrath, <S%G3450><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> They Shall Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2663><s%> My Rest; <S%G3450><s%> Though Verily <S%G2543><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Foundation <S%G2602><s%> Of The World <S%G2889><s%> Were Done. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G2046><s%> For He Has Said <S%G1063><s%> Somewhere <S%G4225><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seventh Day <S%G1442><s%> Thus, <S%G3779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rested <S%G2664><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Seventh <S%G1442><s%> From <S%G575><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> His Works : <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This Place <S%G5129><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> They Shall Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2663><s%> My Rest. <S%G3450><s%>

Since <S%G1893><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> It Remains For <S%G620><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Formerly <S%G4386><s%> Heard Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Enter In <S%G1525><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Disobedience, <S%G543><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> He Determines <S%G3724><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> So Long <S%G5118><s%> A Time, <S%G5550><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> , It Hass Been Said, <S%G2046><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Ye Will Hear, <S%G191><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Harden Not <S%G4645><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Gave Rest, <S%G2664><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G302><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Would He Have Spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3326><s%> Afterwards <S%G5023><s%> Day. <S%G2250><s%>
Then <S%G686><s%> Remains <S%G620><s%> A Sabbatism <S%G4520><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

We Should Be Diligent <S%G4704><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Rest, <S%G2663><s%> <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> After <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Example <S%G5262><s%> May Fell <S%G4098><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Disobedience. <S%G543><s%>

<S%G2198><s%> For Living Is <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Efficient, <S%G1756><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sharper <S%G5114><s%> Than <S%G5228><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Sword <S%G3162><s%> Two Edged, <S%G1366><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Penetrating <S%G1338><s%> To The <S%G891><s%> Division <S%G3311><s%> Of Soul <S%G5590><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Of Joints <S%G719><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Marrows, <S%G3452><s%> And Is <S%G2532><s%> A Discerner <S%G2924><s%> Of The Thoughts <S%G1761><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Intents <S%G1771><s%> Of The Heart. <S%G2588><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not <S%G2076><s%> A Created Thing <S%G2937><s%> Unapparent <S%G852><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3956><s%> But All Things Are <S%G1161><s%> Naked <S%G1131><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Laid Bare <S%G5136><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Of Him, <S%G846><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Whom Is <S%G3739><s%> Our <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Account. <S%G3056><s%>

<S%G2192><s%> Having Therefore <S%G3767><s%> A High Priest <S%G749><s%> Great Who <S%G3173><s%> Has Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> We Should Hold Fast <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Confession. <S%G3671><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Have We <S%G2192><s%> A High Priest <S%G749><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Able <S%G1410><s%> To Sympathise <S%G4834><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G769><s%> With Our Infirmities <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3987><s%> But Who Has Been Tempted <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> According To Our Likeness, <S%G3665><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Sin. <S%G266><s%>

We Should Come <S%G4334><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Grace <S%G5485><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We May Receive <S%G2983><s%> , Mercy, <S%G1656><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> May Find <S%G2147><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Opportune <S%G2121><s%> Help. <S%G996><s%>
